bibl.title: The Nome Coins of Roman Egypt.

bibl.note: Paper given at the Seventeenth Oxford Symposium on Coinage and Monetary History held on 19-22 September 2002 in Worcester College. - [Introduction.] - Herakleopolites. - Koptites. - Hermopolites. - The City of Thebes.
